info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 28 at 3:28PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 400 PM MST... At 327 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Laveen, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. Visibility below 3 miles in blowing dust. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Chandler, Glendale, Tempe, Avondale, Goodyear, Paradise Valley, Tolleson, Laveen, Cashion, Litchfield Park, Papago Park, South Phoenix, Arizona State Fairgrounds, South Mountain Park, Downtown Scottsdale, Camelback Mountain, Sky Harbor Airport, Glendale Sports Complex and Arizona Mills Mall. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 129 and 160. AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 195 and 205. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 1 and 5. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
